title: Dominic Raab – 2021 Statement on Venezuela
author: admin
summary: The statement made by Dominic Raab, the Foreign Secretary, on 5 March 2021.
content:
The decision of the regime in Venezuela to expel the Head of the EU Delegation is unwarranted and deeply regrettable. The UK stands shoulder to shoulder with our EU partners.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
